巨型薑餅人
Giant Timmy the Gingerbread Man
kDesc
What's the only thing better than a Gingerbread Man? A GIANT Gingerbread Man, of course! [#Legal]
Mieux qu'un bonhomme en pain d'épice ? Un bonhomme en pain d'épice GÉANT bien sûr ! [#Legal]
Was ist besser als ein Pfefferkuchenmann? Natürlich ein RIESIGER Pfefferkuchenmann! [#Legal]
Che cosa c'è di meglio che un omino di marzapane? Un omino di marzapane gigante, ovviamente! [#Legal]
¿Qué única cosa es mejor que un hombre de jengibre? ¡Un hombre de jengibre GIGANTE! [#Legal]
진저브레드 맨 보다 더 좋은 것이 뭐가 있을까요? 그거야 물론 더 큰 진저브레드 맨이지요! [#Legal]
What's the only thing better than a Gingerbread Man? A GIANT Gingerbread Man, of course! [#Legal]
還有什麼禮物能比薑餅人好？當然是巨型薑餅人啊！ [#Legal]
還有什麼禮物能比薑餅人好？當然是巨型薑餅人啊！ [#Legal]
What's the only thing better than a Gingerbread Man? A GIANT Gingerbread Man, of course! [#Legal]
